pkgmetadata.longdescription: Statistical Modeling of Animal Movements // Animal movement models including moving-resting process with embedded Brownian motion according to Yan et al. (2014) doi:10.1007/s10144-013-0428-8, Pozdnyakov et al. (2017) doi:10.1007/s11009-017-9547-6, Brownian motion with measurement error according to Pozdnyakov et al. (2014) doi:10.1890/13-0532.1, and moving-resting-handling process with embedded Brownian motion, Pozdnyakov et al. (2018) arXiv:1806.00849.
